profile:
Creative Interiors is a Toronto based design firm, specializing in custom decorating for residential & commercial clients.

Roz Pagesâ€™ background derives from the UK, once based in London, one of the top cities in the world for design. Having spent many working holidays in Europe, France & Italy being her favorite, she brings to Toronto a European flair which comes from her passion for fabrics & color. She is dedicated to creating exceptional, distinctive & uniquely personal Interiors.

Roz works with Realtors and has just staged a 5 Million Dollar house located by the Cricket Club. 

Services include:  Interior Decorating, Staging, Project Management and Colour Consultation.
All hired contractors are licensed and insured.
service_area: Toronto, Forest Hill, Rosedale, Lawrence Park, Annex, North York
services: Interior Design, Staging, Project Management, Colour Consultation. Custom Furnishings, Flooring, Space Planning, Window Coverings.
name: Creative Interiors

profile:
FINE DESIGN Interiors has been in business for 17 years and has over 25 years experience in the furniture business. We specialize in custom made furniture, custom headboards and re-upholstery, sofa repair and wood refinishing. All our work is tailored by professionals. Our custom made sofas can be tailored to any size and any color combinations. FINE DESIGN Interiors can provide you with a free quote for your upholstery needs. Just send us a picture, dimension and type of fabric you like. 

You may have seen our work at the ROYAL YORK HOTEL, Windsor Arms and Chateau Laurier.
products: upholstered Furniture and also metal  base
name: Fine Design Interiors Inc

profile: NAKED FURNITURE has been selling Canadian made SOLID WOOD FURNITURE for over 50 years. Pine, Maple, Oak, and Poplar woods. We specialize in condo sized furniture and offer custom made furniture in your size and your finish. We are excited to introduce our LIGHTING GALLERY to Naked Furniture. We have a huge selection of lights for the hallway, dining room and bedroom.
service_area: We would love to deliver and set up your NAKED FURNITURE purchases for you. You have probably seen our NAKED FURNITURE truck in your area already. We not only deliver to the GTA but cottage country as well.
products: NAKED FURNITURE's showroom is over 10,000 square feet. We sell Canadian made solid wood furniture-everything from live edge tables, sideboards, end tables, buffets, coffee tables, chairs, bunk beds, desks, bookcases, beds, night tables, toy boxes, curios, pantries, stools, armoires, chests, bars, mirrors, benches, storage units, deacons benches, huntboards. entry tables, change tables, children's tables and chairs and cribs. Condo and Custom sized furniture are our specialty.
services: Take home our unpainted furniture and finish it yourself or have our professional finishers do the work for you. Select your finish from our extensive stain boards or tell us a Benjamin Moore paint finish that you would love us to paint or bring us an existing piece of your own furniture that you would like us to match. We also refinish your outdated furniture with a new finish. Can't find the right size or style for your home or condo ? Brian would be happy to design and build your custom furniture for you. We also work with movie and TV production companies to supply furniture for their movies and TV shows.
brands: College Woodwork, John Michael Collection, Sleepking Mattresses, Unique Traditions, Rossport Line, Carson Collection,  Bayview, Wacky Clocks, Carson Cribs, Cottage Line, Polo Pine Furniture, John Greenleaf, Leather Craft, Artcraft, Avista, Eurohome and Crystal World Lighting.
specialities: We offer professional discounts to accredited designers. We specialize in condo and custom sized furniture. Your size, your finish, no problem. We are proud to be an Eco Green company in which our wood is harvested from managed forests. We sell high quality solid wood furniture that can be passed down from one generation to the next.
payment_method: VISA, MASTERCARD, AMEX, DEBIT, CASH , CHEQUE
name: Naked Furniture

profile:
Roca Wood Works Inc. is a young, fast growing company which was born from an interior calling to create one of a kind and unique piece of furniture.
 
All our salvaged live edge and reclaimed wood are locally sourced, milled, kiln dried using only non toxic and food friendly products for finishes.
 
Our close collaboration with City of Toronto help us build a strong relationship with the community and keep a green city for everyone.
 
Visit our showroom and leave with a little piece of art.
